section:
Référence de l'interface NetworkExceptionInterface NetworkExceptionInterface Graphe d'héritage de NetworkExceptionInterface:
Graphe de collaboration de NetworkExceptionInterface:
Fonctions membres publiques
getRequest ()
Description détaillée
Thrown when the request cannot be completed because of network issues.
There is no response object as this exception is thrown when no response has been received.
Example: the target host name can not be resolved or the connection failed.
Documentation des fonctions membres
getRequest() getRequestNetworkExceptionInterface NetworkExceptionInterfacegetRequest
getRequest ( )
Returns the request.
The request object MAY be a different object from the one passed to ClientInterface::sendRequest()
Renvoie
RequestInterface
Implémenté dans ConnectException.
